subject: Marathon Running
Records and Achievements
Running
lead_paragraph: Haile Gebrselassie of Ethiopia broke his own record in the Berlin marathon on Sunday and became the first person the run the race in under 2 hours 4 minutes.
snippet: Haile Gebrselassie of Ethiopia broke his own record in the Berlin marathon on Sunday and became the first person the run the race in under 2 hours 4 minutes.
